messages.subject: Software Engineer Role at Stripe
messages.body: Hi! We reviewed your application and would love to schedule a call. Are you available this week?

messages.subject: Following up on my application
messages.body: Hi, I submitted my application last week and wanted to follow up.

messages.subject: Re: Coffee chat request
messages.body: Happy to chat! How about next Tuesday at 2pm?

messages.subject: Thank you for the interview
messages.body: Thank you for taking the time to speak with me about the Senior Engineer role. I enjoyed learning about the team.

messages.subject: Next steps - Product Engineer
messages.body: Great news! The team loved your take-home. We'd like to schedule a final round. Please share your availability for next week.
